name: Smith Shop
description:
Welcome Blacksmith!

Having just opened your weapon shop, there is a lot of work ahead.

Sell large quantities of weapon  to your customers and grow your business. Soon everyone will want to buy from you!

Features :

- To sell your products at a good price you must organize lots of at least 3 identical items. 

- Improve the quality of your products.

- Get more customers.

- Make your shop larger.

Improve your business :

Perhaps the size of your store is not exactly what you expected. But there are several ways to improve!

Game made with Godot Engine.

Musics from Zakiro

Assets

Modern Interiors: LimeZu

Interior Pack: Free RPG asset by Gif
